OOC:WHO CARES IF THEY USE NAMES FROM STARCRAFT OR NOT.DONT WASTE 
MESSAGES IN THIS RPG. IT GETS AGGRAVATING WHEN SOMEONE COMES BACK AND 
HAS TO READ 100 OOC MAILS. SO EITHER SEND YOUR OOC MAILS WITH AN BIC 
RPG OR DONT SEND AT ALL, I BEG YOU. I KNOW THAT I AM NOT IN THE
CONCIL BUT, I HATE COMING BACK HAVING TO READ 100 OOC MAILS.

BIC:Scopronok

Scorponok walks up to KitKat, "Hi , I am back, What happen to 
Megatorns troops while I was gone?" Scopronok then ask, "Where is 
Darkmouse?"
